step1.para: Install the coupler on the range mainshaft, clutching teeth to the rear ( Figure 237).

figure.caption: Figure 236. Install Coupler on Range Mainshaft

step1.para: Install the low range gear on the mainshaft against the coupler, clutching teeth to the front ( Figure 238).

figure.caption: Figure 237. Install Low Range Gear on Mainshaft

step1.para: Install the splined tolerance washer on the mainshaft and in the hub of the low range gear ( Figure 239). Rotate the washer in the groove of the mainshaft to engage external splines with the clutching teeth of the gear and align square internal spline with the keyway of the mainshaft.

figure.caption: Figure 238. Install Splined Tolerance Washer on Mainshaft

note.para: This washer is available in varying thicknesses. Use the splined tolerance washer that provides a snug fit in the gear hub.

step1.para: Install the key in the keyway of the range mainshaft, inserting the thick end of the key in the square internal spline of the tolerance washer to lock the low range gear on the shaft ( Figure 240).

figure.caption: Figure 239. Install Key in Keyway of Range Mainshaft
